title: Expand product catalog with additional collection items

requirements.text: Add at least 4 new products to the backend main.mo products array, maintaining the same structure as existing items (id, name, price, description) with realistic fashion items that fit the HIZE premium minimalist aesthetic

quotes: can we add more collecting items/

acceptanceCriteria: Backend products array contains at least 8 total items (4 existing + 4 new)
New products follow naming conventions consistent with existing items (e.g., 'Heavyweight Tee', 'Linen Trousers')
Price points range between $25-$150 to maintain premium positioning
Each product has a unique ID continuing the sequence from existing products

requirements.text: Update frontend ProductGrid.tsx to display all new products in the existing responsive grid layout without modifying the grid structure or styling

quotes: can we add more collecting items/

acceptanceCriteria: All backend products render automatically in the product grid
Grid maintains responsive behavior with proper spacing
New products display with 'Add to Bag' functionality identical to existing items

constraints: Do not modify the existing four products (Heavyweight Tee, Linen Trousers, Canvas Tote, Studio Cap)
Maintain single-actor backend architecture with all logic in main.mo
Preserve existing cart functionality and product card styling
nonGoals: Modifying the overall page layout or navigation structure
